title: Google\Cloud\RequestWrapper
name: RequestWrapper
description: The RequestWrapper is responsible for delivering and signing requests.

params.name: options.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: options.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests.

params.name: options.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: options.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: options.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

params.name: options.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

methods.name: getCredentialsFetcher
methods.description: Gets the credentials fetcher. Precedence begins with user supplied credentials fetcher instance, followed by a reference to a key file stream, and finally the application default credentials.
